name: Container
description: A container component with gutter padding

useThemeGutterPadding.label: Use gutter padding
useThemeGutterPadding.description: When true, uses the theme gutter spacing as the container's horizontal padding

backgroundImage.label: Background image
backgroundImage.description: Background image to apply to the container

backgroundImageResizeMode.label: Background image resize mode
backgroundImageResizeMode.description: Determines how to resize the background image when the frame doesn't match the raw image dimensions

elevation.label: Elevation
elevation.description: Elevation of the component. A number 0-3.
